angstd.model.io
Interface DataWriter<T extends AngstdData>

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractDataWriter, XdomWriter
public interface DataWriter<T extends AngstdData>

Interface DataWriter defines the methods to write data into a file.
AbstractDataWriter is the basic implementation for this interface and special parser classes like XdomWriter should extend this AbstractDataWriter.

Because the type of data which has to be written into a file is generic the requested type must implement the empty AngstdData interface.

Author:
Andreas Held

          In this method the actual parsing is done.

Method Detail

write

void write(java.io.File file,

Writes the data into a file.

Parameters:
file - file to be created
data - the data to be written

write

void write(java.io.BufferedWriter out,
           T[] data)
In this method the actual parsing is done. All other methods just create the BufferedWriter which is then passed to this method.

Parameters:
out - the created BufferedWriter used to write into the file
data - the data to be written
